video.title: Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes return home after All My Sons opening night on Broadway in New York City
video.description: Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes arrive back home to their Manhattan apartment following the after-party for Katie Holmes' opening night performance in 'All My Sons' on Broadway. Photographers tell Katie congratulations and ask Tom how Katie's performance was, and Tom responds that "It was a great night." They then quickly pose for photographs together, and one of the paparazzi tells Katie to "Go get that Tony!" and Tom tells the photographers to "Have a good night, guys." before they walk into the apartment building.
